name: bpl-commander
description: BPL Commander - Comprehensive Project Management Application

scripts.predev: cross-env-shell "taskkill /f /im node.exe 2>nul || taskkill /f /im nodemon.exe 2>nul || taskkill /f /im vite.exe 2>nul || true"
scripts.setup:registry: npm config set registry https://registry.npmjs.org/ && npm config delete proxy && npm config delete https-proxy
scripts.setup:clean: npm cache clean --force && rimraf node_modules package-lock.json backend/node_modules backend/package-lock.json frontend/node_modules frontend/package-lock.json shared/node_modules shared/package-lock.json
scripts.dev:yarn: concurrently --kill-others --prefix-colors "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold" --prefix "[{name}]" --names "backend,frontend" "cd backend && yarn dev" "cd frontend && yarn dev"
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:yarn: cd backend && yarn build && cd ../frontend && yarn build
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:yarn: cd backend && yarn test && cd ../frontend && yarn test
scripts.clean: cross-env-shell "taskkill /f /im node.exe 2>nul || taskkill /f /im nodemon.exe 2>nul || taskkill /f /im vite.exe 2>nul || true"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../shared && npm install
